section.p: The crew are very nervous about your orders. They drop anchor in a bay, and will row you to shore, but they absolutely refuse to come with you. In fact, they won’t even wait for you to come back.
If you insist on going ashore, your crew will sail for Yellowport and meet you there. ‘If you ever make it back,’ adds the first mate ominously.
If you want to go ashore note on your Adventure Sheet that your ship is now docked in Yellowport, and . Otherwise, and choose again.
